Section.Catchline: Placement in county-operated boot camp programs for youthful offenders.

SectionBody.Text: In counties where there are county-operated youthful offender boot camp programs, other than boot camps described in s. 958.04, the court may sentence a youthful offender to such a boot camp. In county-operated youthful offender boot camp programs, juvenile offenders shall not be commingled with youthful offenders.
